page.title: Users

modal-delete-user.title: Delete user?
modal-delete-user.description: This action is permanent and cannot be reversed. Are you sure?

modal-delete-link.title: Slet inviteringslink?
modal-delete-link.description: Denne handling er permanent og kan ikke laves om. Er du helt sikker?

modal-create-user.role-web-access: The user should have access to the web

modal-create-user.role-price-access: The user should have access to the prices
modal-create-user.mail-checkbox: Send an email to the user with login information
